elements.name: controlId
elements.description: Always 40.

elements.name: filler1
elements.description: Space fill until expanded length fully supported. Reserved filler for future expansion of the Line Item Identifier when fully ACE compatible.

elements.name: lineItemIdentifier
elements.description: The filer/transmitter’s identity of the specific line item within an Entry Summary.

elements.name: articleSetIndicator
elements.description:
An indication that the Entry Summary Line Item is part of an article ‘set’ as defined by General Rules of Interpretation (GRI 3(b) and 3(c)) (i.e., a provision for the classification of mixtures, composite goods of different materials or made up of different components, and goods put up in sets for retail sale.)

  • The line item is the ‘header’ of an article set.
  • The line item is a component of an article set.

See Usage Note ‘(k) Reporting Article Sets’ for more information. Space fill if the line item is NOT part of an article set.

options.X: The line item is the ‘header’ of an article set.
options.V: The line item is a component of an article set.

elements.name: countryOfOriginCode
elements.description:
The country from which the article originated.

Report standard ISO Country Code or ‘**’ if the country of origin is not known.

elements.name: countryOfExportCode
elements.description:
The country from which the article was shipped to the U.S. having last been a part of the commerce of that country.

Report standard ISO Country Code. Space fill if not required/not reported.

elements.name: dateOfExportation
elements.description:
The date that the exporting vessel departed the last port in the exporting country.

Space fill if not required/not reported.

elements.name: dateOfExportationForTextiles
elements.description:
For textile goods reported with a visa, the date the article was exported from the Country of Origin.

Space fill if not required/not reported.

elements.name: tradeAgreementSpecialProgramClaimCode
elements.originalName: Trade Agreement/ Special Program Claim Code
elements.description:
A code that specifies an applicable trade agreement or applicable program that may reduce or eliminate duty and/or MPF.

See ‘AE Table 8 – Trade Agreement / Special Program Claim Codes’ for a list of codes. Space fill if not used.

elements.name: chargesAmount
elements.description:
Aggregate cost (excluding duty) of freight, insurance, and other costs incurred, reported in whole U.S. dollars.

See Usage Note ‘(v) Article Charges’ for more information. Report zeroes if not

elements.name: foreignPortOfLadingCode
elements.description:
The code for the foreign port that the merchandise was laden onto the importing vessel. (See ‘Schedule K – Classification of Foreign Ports by Geographic Trade Area and Country’.)

Space fill if not required/not reported.

elements.name: grossShippingWeight
elements.description:
Gross shipping weight of the article in kilograms. Weight to include packaging, but exclude carrier equipment (shipping container, etc.).

Report zeroes if not used.

elements.name: categoryCodeForTextiles
elements.description:
A code that further categorizes textiles and fabrics as related to a quota or visa as classified by the U.S. Textile and Apparel Category System. Report the actual category code; the following is for informational purposes only.

  • series are of cotton and/or manmade fiber.
  • series are of cotton.
  • series are of wool.
  • series are of manmade fiber.
  • series are of silk.
  • series are of silk blends or noncotton vegetable fibers.

Space fill if not used.

options.200: Series are of cotton and/or manmade fiber.
options.800: Series are of silk blends or noncotton vegetable fibers.

elements.name: productClaimCode
elements.description:
A code that further identifies a product or request.

  • Craft Beverage Modernization Act Refund Claim. Furthermore: “The information submitted is true and accurate and I assume the responsibility for proving such representations. I understand that I am liable for any false statements or material omissions made on or in connection with this submission. I certify that I have determined and ascertained that the control group of which I am a member (including both domestic and foreign members of the control group) has not exceeded the quantitative limit applicable to the tax rate or tax credit I am claiming”.

These codes may exempt a visa reporting requirement.

  • A ‘folklore product’ (hand-loomed fabric, hand-made articles made of hand-loomed fabric and traditional products of the cottage industry).
  • A ‘made to measure’ suit of Hong Kong origin. The Category Codes associated with suits are 443, 444, 643, 644, 843 and 844.
  • Certain garments in chapter 61 or 62 of the HTS which may be eligible for entry under a special access program.
  • A textile fashion sample.

Space fill if not used.

options.C: Craft Beverage Modernization Act Refund Claim. Furthermore: “The information submitted is true and accurate and I assume the responsibility for proving such representations. I understand that I am liable for any false statements or material omissions made on or in connection with this submission. I certify that I have determined and ascertained that the control group of which I am a member (including both domestic and foreign members of the control group) has not exceeded the quantitative limit applicable to the tax rate or tax credit I am claiming”.
options.F: A ‘folklore product’ (hand-loomed fabric, hand-made articles made of hand-loomed fabric and traditional products of the cottage industry).
options.G: A ‘made to measure’ suit of Hong Kong origin. The Category Codes associated with suits are 443, 444, 643, 644, 843 and 844.
options.H: Certain garments in chapter 61 or 62 of the HTS which may be eligible for entry under a special access program.

elements.name: relatedPartyIndicator
elements.description:
An indication that the transaction is between parties as defined in Section 402(g)(1) of the Tariff Act of 1930, amended.

  • Yes; Companies related.
  • No; Companies NOT related.

Space fill if not required/not reported.

elements.name: naftaNetCostIndicator
elements.description:
An indication that the determination of NAFTA origin material used in the article conforms to the ‘net cost’ (average) method.

  • Yes; NAFTA net cost determination applies.

Space fill if not specified; NAFTA net cost determination does not apply.

options.Y: Yes; NAFTA net cost determination applies.

elements.name: feeExemptionCode
elements.description:
An indication that the article is exempt from a specific fee.

  • Cotton (056) fee exempt for the cotton article.
  • Other agriculture fee exempt; Importer has obtained an organic product exemption certificate from the Department of Agriculture. (Note: The preferred alternative to this method of organic exemption is to specify ‘22’ as a License / Certificate / Permit Type Code in the input 52-Record. The use of a Fee Exemption Code of ‘2’ in the 40- Record will be discontinued in a future release TBD.).

Space fill if not required/not reported.

options.1: Cotton (056) fee exempt for the cotton article.
options.2: Other agriculture fee exempt; Importer has obtained an organic product exemption certificate from the Department of Agriculture.

elements.name: filler2
elements.description: Space fill.

elements.name: adCaseNonReimbursementStatement
elements.description:
For AD/CVD entries, the Importer’s disclosure statement.

  • “I hereby certify that I have not entered into any agreement or understanding for the payment or for the refunding to me, by the manufacturer, producer, seller, or exporter, of all or any part of the antidumping duties or countervailing duties assessed upon merchandise entered under this AD/CVD line of this entry summary. I further certify that U.S. Customs and Border Protection will be notified if there is any reimbursement of antidumping or countervailing duties by the manufacturer, producer, seller, or exporter to the importing company at any time in the future for this AD/CVD line.”.

Specify ‘Y’ only if the AD/CVD line includes an AD case.

Space fill if:

  • Not an AD/CVD entry type.
  • No cases are being reported on this line.
  • Only a CVD case is being reported for this line.
  • An AD case is being reported, yet no declaration is being made.

elements.name: filler3
elements.description: Space fill.
